name: International Address Checker
author: Matrixian

sections.description:
The International Address Checker is a free (WooCommerce) plugin that guarantees correct address input from your customers on, for example, your own registration or checkout webpage. It covers more than 170 countries and comes in the correct address structure, as applicable in that particular country.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

By simply implementing the plugin into your own website, you are assured of fast and error-free address entries of customers worldwide. A link to Matrixian’s international database checks the address input during a registration process or online purchase. If the address does not exist or when it is written incorrectly, the International Address Checker plugin immediately provides your customer with the correct alternative!

For technical details about the API click here.

PLUGIN ACTIVATION

  1. Create a free account on the Matrixian platform
  2. Go to your WordPress account and click on Woocommerce > Settings > Advanced > International Address Checker
  3. Fill in your Matrixian Platform account credentials
  4. Save changes
  5. The International Address Checker is now active

KEY FEATURES

  • 500 free request per month
  • Ensures you of qualitative data input on your own website
  • Correct addresses in your database
  • Improves the customer experience
  • Increases reach and thus the conversion
  • Prevents costs for returns
  • Fast response time
  • Completely international

GETTING STARTED

The plugin requires a Matrixian platform account. You can register for free on the Matrixian platform and then use the same e-mailadres and password to login to your WooCommerce account.

Register for free
sections.installation:
1. Upload matrixian-address-validator.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Settings page and enable the API
  4. Fill out your Matrixian account credentials
  5. Address Validator is now active
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free to use?

Yes, you get 500 free request per month.

Does it work for my country?

We provide support for the following countries at the moment: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Germany, France, Italy, Luxembourg, Spain, Sweden, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, United States

Does it include auto-complete functionality?

No, this plugin is used for address validation purposes only.

Where can I get a Matrixian account?

You can register for free on the Matrixian platform and then use the same e-mailadres and password to login to your WooCommerce account.

Register for free
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Update description
  • Add link for free subscription option

1.0.0

  • Support validation for all listed WooCommerce countries.
  • Support address validation for billing and shipping addresses.
  • Initial version.
